item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

It sounds a bit STUPID but I made a Vote4Cash System and everything works fine but, I want to change the reward item into magepoints how do i do this?

if(checkVotes(playerName)) { getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); sendMessage("Thanks for voting!"); }
